name: Maelstrom

components.m: paper or leaf in the shape of a funnel

entries: A swirling mass of 5-foot-deep water appears in a 30-foot radius centered on a point you can see within range. The point must be on the ground or in a body of water. Until the spell ends, that area is {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, and any creature that starts its turn there must succeed on a Strength saving throw or take {@damage 6d6} bludgeoning damage and be pulled 10 feet toward the center.
